definitions: with an excessively high opinion of one's appearance, abilities, or worth

examples.text: I stared at myself vainly in the mirror
they were vainly looking at old videos of themselves

shortDefinitions: with excessively high opinion of one's appearance or worth

definitions: in a way that produces no result; to no avail

examples.text: I was vainly trying to get to sleep
she searched vainly for a pulse

shortDefinitions: in way that produces no result

examples.text: he vainly hoped to be appointed master
he falls hopelessly and vainly in love with her
